newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sumitomo Osaka to change rule for share repurchase.
newsitem.headline: Sumitomo Osaka to change rule for share repurchase.

text.p: Sumitomo Osaka Cement Co Ltd, a major cement maker, said on Friday it had decided to change its regulations to allow it to repurchase shares more swiftly.
The firm said it plans to repurchase up to 45 million of its shares.
The decision needs to be approved at Sumitomo Osaka's shareholders' meeting on June 27.
Sumitomo Osaka said the change in regulations would enable the firm to make decisions over share repurchases at board of directors' meetings, which are held more often than shareholders' meetings.
Currently, share buy backs need to be decided at shareholders' meetings.
